choices: The cow falls down on you
155221211222212.content:
Climbing over would be too risky. It would be easier to go under the cow, you think.

Crouching down, you try to pull up a flap of flab to give you more room.

The flab is quite heavy, and the only thing keeping the underbelly of the cow up is its position. If it moved you could be trapped underneath this sleeping behemoth.

Still, you should be able to do it, so you clamber in.

Instantly, the body heat of the cow makes you sweat, allowing for easy movement against the tough skin.

Before long, your entire naked form is below the cow, and you havent reached the other side.

Your head collides with something, and you realise its the udder. Your're only half-way across!

That collision causes something to happen.
155221211222212.title: Crawling to freedom...

15522121122222.content:
You are confronted by a very fat and awake cow that blocks your path. The building you've just entered looks like a regular house, but the cow is blocking the path with its girth. The ceiling must be 10 or 15 feet high! You can see no way getting pass this fat cow.


"Well, hello there" said the cow in a friendly voice. A female voice.

"Um..Hi" you say nervously. Talking horses and now talking cows?! Just where the hell are you, anyway? How did you get here in the first place? You don't remember how you got here, either...all you remember is suddenly finding yourself in this strange place. Could it be that all of this is a dream? That would explain much....


"Let me guess...you'll like to get pass me" said the cow.

"Yes" you say. "I'm...er...running away from the horses and this crazy man named Jason"

"Those horses can be pushy" said the cow. "I suppose they..."

"Sorry, but I really don't have time for this" you say. "can you move out of my way?"

This makes the cow laugh, which shakes the floor slighty.

"As you can see, I can't move an inch" said the cow, who tries to move. Its girth prevents the cow from moving much. "If you want to get pass me, there's only one way"

"And what's that?" you ask, fearing the answer.

"Through my digestive system" said the cow.

You groan loudly.

"Don't worry" said the cow. "you won't be harmed"

The cow is blocking your path, and there's no way around it unless you wanna go through it. You can go back outside, but that'll mean that the horses and Jason can find you. What to do?
15522121122222.title: Fat Cow

155221211222221.content:
You look at the fat girth of the cow blocking the entire hallway and sigh, "I can't go back outside so I guess I don't have a choice but to crawl through you."

"Oh goody!" The huge cow grins as she opens her mouth impossibly wide, "Just crawl right in! Don't worry you won't hurt me."

You're more worried about yourself but you don't say anything as you get down on your hands and knees and nervously crawl into the cow’s mouth. You take one last look behind you before you enter the cow's throat and loose sight of the cow's mouth as it closes behind you. Only faint amounts of light filter through the cows thick flesh and fat.

Things get uncomfortably tight as you're forced to crawl on your belly to proceed in the warm and wet darkness of the cow's throat. After crawling for what seems like hours the throat finally opens up into the cow's first stomach. You slide into the stomach and end up waist deep in disgusting goo.

You gag on the horrible smell but continue forward until you reach the other side of the stomach. You then force yourself into another tube where you once again have to crawl on your belly to proceed. You keep crawling for what seems like another hour when to your surprise the path splits!

"What? This is a digestive system! How can there be more than one path?" You exclaim in frustration.
155221211222221.title: Journey Through The Center of the Cow

choices: You see a sign that says "Exit - 20 miles" in this stomach
1552212112222211.content: Digestive sysytems only have one path...right? But this cow has two paths! You quickly decide to take the right path and see where it takes you. You crawl on your belly through the tight tube you're in for 30 minutes when you emerge from the tube and enter the 2nd stomach...or this could be the third stomach. The first stomach wasn't big...this stomach you're in now is much more bigger than it seems possible. You're able to stand up straight and walk towards the end of the stomach. You're walking in ankle-deep stomach acid, but it has no effect on you. The 2nd stomach is perhaps half a mile long and 20 feet high...truly impossible. But then, you saw some impossible things before going into this cow. You've spent nearly two hours in the cow, and you wonder how much longer it will take. You amuse yourself with the idea that you'll never get out..that the cow's insides are far more bigger than the outside of the cow. You reach the end of the 2nd stomach and come to yet another tube that forces you to crawl on your belly. You go through the tube, which leads you into another stomach.
1552212112222211.title: 2nd Stomach

15522121122222112.content:
As you are crawling in the tube, you head bumped against somethimg hard. You moved yourself backward against the soft walls in pain, holding your head to make sure you didn't hurt yourself. After recovering from the bump, you look a head in the tube to see what have hit you.....

It was a small wooden sign. Did this huge cow eat everything she saw?, you thought. There is something written on the sign and there is some kind of map on it too. Suddenly, you began to rush toward the sigb, thinking that it may contain information about the fastest way to get out of this coe. But the more you read through, the more your heart sank.

It reads:

Distance of destinations

Third stomach: 5 mile
Bovine Lodge: 9 mile
Fourth Stomach: 13 mile
Intestines: 15 mile
The Exit: 20 mile

20 MILES TO THE EXIT?!!!!!!! You've got to be kidding me!!, you thought. How am I supposed to get out of this cow now?

While most of the destination seem conventional for a cow's body, one of them seem to be weird. The "Bovine Lodge?" What is that supposed to mean? Is there some kind of place you can stay at in this cow?

You decided that you should move on to find out. You continue to travel through the narrow tube for 2 more hours before you finally reached the third stomach. It is even larger than the second one; probably the size of a large stadium. The floor is covered in a gunky sea of acids with undigested pieces of unrecognizable food. You wadded your way through the mess, wanting to get out of the cow sooner.

Transversing the third stomach took you another 3 hours. By this time, you are completely exhausted; unable to traveling any farther. You remember something about the "Bovine Lodge" you saw on the sign earlier today.

You hope that it means that you can find a place to sleep for tonight......in a cow!

You head toward the 'lodge'.

What would you find there?
15522121122222112.title: 20 more miles in the cow

choices: Get a room for the night
155221211222221121.content:
You can hardly believe that all of this can be inside a cow. It's just impossible! As you make your way through the third stomach, you see a building made out from the material that the stomach is made from. As you get closer to it, you see a sign over the door that says "The Bovine Lodge". It has three stories and seems to be located near the exit of the third stomach, The exit to the third stomach has a sign next to it....and there's even more places listed here.

Fourth Stomach Bar 8 1/2 Miles
The Quadrangle 3 Miles
Milk Ocean 10 miles
The Exit 15 miles



Wait.....didn't the last sign say the exit was 15 miles too? Shaking your head, you enter the Bovine Lodge. You enter into what looks like a bar area, filled with barn animals of all kinds. You look around as you walk up to the bar. The bartender is a huge horse.
"What will you have?" asked the horse in a female voice.
"Umm....milk I guess" you say.
The bartender snorts and gives you a glass of milk.
"A word about the milk" said the bartender. "it'll make your insides far more bigger than the outside. How do you think Bessie has such massive insides?"
"That's a load of shit" you snort, and you drink the milk....it's the best milk you ever tasted!
155221211222221121.title: The Bovine Lodge

1552212112222211211.content:
You sit at a bar stool against the counter, sipping the huge pint of milk, fresh from Bessie's udder. Around you, you saw other horses, bulls, sheep all talking in quiet, low voices. From the snippets you heard from the farm animals around you, they are all similarly unwillingly eaten by Bessie the huge cow and trapped in here. Some of them talked about how they eventually learn to enjoy Bessie's interior world (to stay away from the craziness of the farm outside) while others discuss about ways to escape from the cow. The first time you saw Bessie, you knew that there is something funny about her. But you entered her willingly to escape from the other crazed animals on the farm. And now, you find yourself trapped with other animals in the Bovine Lodge, uncertain whether you will ever make it out. Reading the time on your watch, it's already 10:30PM, pretty late by your standard. You're feeling extremely tired from the entire day's traveling in Bessie, so you decided to you should get a room for the night at the Bovine Lodge. You took one last sip from the huge pint of milk, savoring the unique sweetness and mythical qualities it possesses.

You ask the bartender if there are any rooms vacant in the lodge. The horse pointed toward a simple front desk with another horse stationed. You thanked the bartender as you head for the front desk, wanting to find a room for yourself. When you arrived at the front desk, the 'concierge' mare gave a sweet smile.

"Welcome to the Bovine Lodge in Bessie. How may I help you?", the mare said with a soft voice.

Within seconds, as if her routine greetings suddenly gave way to realization, her big, brown eyes widened as she looked at you.

"Whoa. It looks like we have a rare guest this evening.", she said, "Humans aren't a common sight in Bessie. She must've been really hungry to eat a human."

You smiled back: "Actually, I came in here on my own. Bessie wanted me to enter her for safety. I came a long way from the stomachs to get here."

"Oh...Bessie probably really like you then.", said the mare, "You must be tired from the walking and slipping. Bessie's stomachs can sometimes be a real bugger if you're a first-timer in her."

"Alright then, are there any rooms available tonight?", you asked, "I'm kinda exhausted from the travel."

"Well, there certainly are, human." , the mare replied, "Your room is located on the third floor on the left-hand side."

The 'concierge' mare handed you a small, shaft-shaped key made of bone. "I hope you'll enjoy your stay with us.", she said again smiling widely.

You took the key from her hooves and you started heading up a stairway to the right of the front desk. You walked up the stairs, which is soft because it is made from stomach flesh. After several flights of stairs, you reached the third floor. You quickly located your room and you used the key to unlock the rubbery doorway. Once you got inside the room, you are amazed by how fine the room looks like.

The room is styled like a stable, but with human furniture. There's a small desk, chair, and even a small television. Virtually everything in the room is made from Bessie's flesh except for the bed, which is made from several bales of hays covered with a sheet, comforter, and pillow for you to sleep in. The light in the room comes from the bio-luminescent blobs hanging on the ceiling. At the end of the room is a window made from a hard membrane that overlooks the entire third stomach of Bessie.

Then, you went to check on the bathroom, which luckily, is in human-style; You can't imagine yourself relieving directly onto the ground. Apparently, the animals in Bessie have adopted some of the more sophisticated technologies of humans. You tried the faucet on the sink, which runs with clean water.

Seeing all things are fine in the room, you went to turn on the television which, to your disappointment, only runs "local tv" with none of your favorite channels on. As you flipped through numerous channels you found that there are: MooTV, Bessie News, Bovine-N. All of the newscasters are animals who are talking about how a milk shortage was narrowly averted when Bessie began consuming top-quality hays. Another channel talks about "Food Forecast"; what the animals predict Bessie will eat for the next day. There is also one giving the ideal 'vacation spots' in Bessie's udder.

'What kind of world is this?", you wondered as you prepared yourself for bed, 'Hopefully, it will be worth seeing when I get up tomorrow.'
1552212112222211211.title: Checking In the Bovine Lodge

choices: There's a knock on the door
15522121122222112112.content:
You don't know how long you've been asleep when you heard the pounding at the door. You jerked out of a very deep sleep and looked around at the room with a fair amount of confusion. Then, you remember what had happened to you. There's someone pounding on the door, wanting to come in. You look at your watch and see that it's 4:30 in the morning. Wondering who would pound at your door at this hour, you get up from the bed and walk over to the door. You take a look through the peephole in the door to see who is on the other side. On the other side, you see three animals; two rabbits and what looks like a large raccoon. The raccoon is the tallest of the three; the two rabbits are just a hair above three feet tall. The raccoon is holding a large bag over one shoulder and she looks up and down the hall while the two rabbits keep pounding at your door. Sighing, you open the door.
"Yes?" you barely manage to say before you're forced back by the two rabbits entering the room as well as the raccoon. The raccoon closes and locks the door behind her, and then she looks at you.
"A human?" asked the raccoon. "of all the......."
"Never mind that" said one of the rabbits. "we need a place to hide! That hippo cop won't stop until she gets us!"
"Excuse me" you say. "but who are all of you?"
"Say, did you happen to drink milk tonight?" asks the raccoon.
"Uhh....yes" you say. "what is....?"
"Are you suggesting we hide in the human's stomach?!" asks one of the rabbits. "if he has really drunk some of the milk, we could be stuck in him for a very long time....and I have had enough going through one digestive system for one day"
Hide in your stomach?!
"Whoa there" you say. "first, tell me what's going on!"
"Hippo cop. Chasing us" said one of the rabbit. "we're....a band of thieves and...."
"There's no time to explain" said the raccoon. "now would you kindly open your mouth so that we may hide within you?"
"I can't open my mouth that wide" you say.
"Since you drank the milk you can" said the raccoon.
15522121122222112112.title: Arrival of Thieves in the night

155221211222221121121.content:
You are utterly surprised by the arrival of the three unexpected guest. And foremost of all, these are thieves before you. You are unsure whether it is a good idea to help them? You take a more careful look at the animals in front of you. The raccoon, obviously the leader of the trio, is nearly as tall as you, only a feet or so shorter. The two rabbits have a dark gray color......

An abrupt, loud knocking on the 'bone' door to your room disrupted your thought for a moment. The three animals before seem even more startled by the noise. If you look carefully enough you can even see nervous sweats forming on the racoon's head.

After a moment of silence, you replied to the knocking without opening the locked door.

"Who is it?", you said

"Please unlock the door!", said a low, official-sounding female voice, "This is the 'Bessie Body Police Force'. Three thieves
are suspected to have entered this lodge. We are now searching the entire structure, so please cooperate with the police search."

The large raccoon's face immediately turned white as he frantically look at his rabbit accomplices.

"Please don't turn us over.", pleaded the raccoon, "We are in a very desperate situation now. If you let us hide in you, we will give you something valuable in return."

Even though the raccoon sounded unconvincing and by the fact that the three animals in your room has committed crime, you don't want the police officer at the other end to suspect that you're hiding them or something. Reluctantly, you agree to letting them enter you.

"Hold on a second, I'm coming.", you said to the officer at the door.

"Oh dear, we better make it quick.", one of the rabbit said as the knocking at the door continues.

You saw the fear on their faces grow more and more apparent.

"All you got to do now is to open your mouth wide, human.", the raccoon tells you.

You did as instructed as you slowly opened your mouth. Strangely, you feel your mouth opening far wider and larger than you usually could. Normally, it would be impossible for you to do this, but Bessie's milk made everything possible. You eyes are wide in amazement as your chin literally touched the floor. You saw the raccoon and the rabbit preparing themselves by crawling.

Moments later, you feel furs and legs brushing against your tongue. Although it feels a little strange, it aren't disgusted by the sensation. You felt the animals reaching the area behind your mouth, preparing themselves toward the gullet.

"Thanks for helping us, we couldn't be grateful enough.", the raccoon said before moving on. You felt something going down your throat as you slowly closed your mouth . Then, when you completely closed your mouth, it returns to its normal shape and size. The prickly sensation of furs finally subsided when feel them reached your stomach.

You got up and went for the door and unlocked it, preparing to greet whatever police officer you're going to meet.

Once the door is opened, you saw two animals before you. One is a large hippo while the other is a bobcat. They are both wearing some kind of clothing that is wrapped around their abdomen with the word 'POLICE' and a badge seal with a representation of Bessie emblazoned on it. With a quick glance, you might have thought that they are wearing a loose corset.

The two 'police animals' just stood there. You saw that their eyes are wide, looking at you speechlessly. Without doubt, they are probably surprised that there's a human here in Bessie the cow.

After a long awkward silence, the hippo managed to speak up.

"We must apologize for waking you up at this early hour, my human friend.", the hippo said in low voice, "I'm Officer Potamus and this is my assistant, Officer Lynxie."

You saw the hippo motioned with her stubby leg toward the bobcat who, in return, gave you a polite nod.

"We are from the 3rd Stomach Division of the Bessie Body Police Force. We are here to investigate the whereabouts of three thieves that have been identified as a raccoon and two rabbits. Have you seen them before?"

Officer Lynxie produced a rough sketch from her cloth pocket and smoothed it out with her paws.

You looked at the sketch. It depicts a crudely drawn version of the animals you're hiding in your stomach. Thinking quickly, you pretend to study the sketch carefully to avoid any suspicions. After for a minute or so, you lift up your head to the two police animals.

"I'm sorry.", you said, "But I have not met any of the animals depicted on your sketch."

"I have to inform you that this is serious.", the hippo said, "These thieves have been robbing just about everyone in Bessie. They are considered to have significant danger."

"I see. But I really have no idea about these three.", you said.

The hippo looked at you to study your face for any strange signs. You tried to maintain your calm as you looked at Officer Potamus' eyes. You also notice the bobcat is writing un-discernible notes on another piece of paper with a simple depiction of your face using her claws. The scratching sound she made as she continued writing makes you uneasy.

A minute later, the hippo looked at her assistant as she placed the newly made notes in her cloth.

"I think that they either went for the udder or the fourth stomach.", the hippo said to Officer Lynxie.

Then, the hippo turned toward you.

"Thank you for your time and cooperation. Again, we apologize for the late intrusion. If you ever see these three animals, please immediately notify us at the nearest squad center throughout Bessie's body.", she said.

"Okay, I'll be sure to look out for them.", you replied.

"Let's go and report back to the captain, we got a lot to do.", you heard the bobcat said as you saw them leave. You slowly closed and locked the bone door, breathing a sigh of relief.

Suddenly, you heard a voice in your head. It is the raccoon you hid earlier.

"Whoa, that was close.", you heard him said, "I thought we're done for. The way you just talked them off was just amazing."

info.brief_description: The animals on this farm have certain... needs...
info.description:
Your name is Tom, and having found yourself at a farm, you notice something.

All these animals seem to be really weird. Theres something almost... intelligent about them.

---

I'll allow pretty much everything. This interactive has grown alot since I first created it, and I have YOU to thank (unless you haven't added anything yet. In that case, consider your 'thank' as a deposit, or credit, or some such financial term)

By "pretty much everything" I mean "pretty much everything". There are a few exceptions. I don't really want:

- Badly written additions. If I'm in a good mood I'll edit one or two so they're better quality. If I'm not in a good mood then I'll probably just delete them. You've been warned; if you want to add to this interactive, try and make it decent quality. Poor quality additions just let people down "Ooh, a new addition!" *glances over it* "Aww... Thats shit."

- Extreme amounts of swearing. The occasional word is fine, and helps with grounding it in reality (although how realistic the rest of the content is is debatable...) but if every second word is a swear, its poor quality. Also, try and keep any ethnic or racial slurs out. They are unwelcome.

- Completely non-nonsensical storylines and going offtopic. I know, I know, this whole premise is farsical, but writing "And Tom was walking through the field, and suddenly he met Bowser from the Mario games, and they played croquet together..." is just stupid. If you really want to make a storyline involving videogame characters playing gentlemanly sports, I'm sure theres an interactive somewhere on this site for that sort of stuff, but it isn't this one.

- Seriously extreme fetishes. Actually, I don't mind, as long as its well written and the title of the chapter makes it obvious what it could be about, incase people don't want to read it.


So yeah... Enter the farm. Have fun.
